name: Nanobot
description:
Fight the germs in your bloodstream arcade shooter style with a Nanobot. But beware! Each germ must be hit with the correct agent or all your shooting won't do anything.

You can use keyboard & mouse or a controler. I recommend watching "How to Play" in game for instructions.

Graphics made by

  • Freepik from www.flaticon.com
  • Good Ware from www.flaticon.com
  • monkik from www.flaticon.com
  • Pixel perfect from www.flaticon.com
  • Smashicons from www.flaticon.com
  • ... and my son & me

Font "Space Age" by Justin Callaghan

This is a hobby project with Unity, enjoy!
